file: tmp_【3DLIVE】First Starring Role【轟はじめ⧸ReGLOSS】 #轟はじめ生誕祭2025 [bjPYXtxhm0I]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Hajime and Hakos Baelz perform the song 'Bareriru' on stage.
The performers thank the audience as the lights dim for the next segment.
Hajime performs the 'Odamayo Medley' featuring various cute vocal snippets.
Hajime sits on stage and talks about Noel-senpai's rap before starting her own.
